text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump Hello Mr. President.  THANK YOU! For everything that you are doing!!!  I REALLY enjoyed what you said at the end of your Coronavirus Task Force Briefing 4/23/20, because it was a great message to America, and they hacked it...  Media hackers at it again ☹️.
